verses.verse: Then Yosef <WH3130> came <WH935> <WH8799> and told <WH5046> <WH8686> Pharaoh <WH6547>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, My father <WH1> and my brethren <WH251>, and their flocks <WH6629>, and their herds <WH1241>, and all that they have, are come out <WH935> <WH8804> of the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>; and, behold, they are in the land <WH776> of Goshen <WH1657>.
And he took <WH3947> <WH8804> some <WH7097> of his brethren <WH251>, even five <WH2568> men <WH582>, and presented <WH3322> <WH8686> them unto <WH6440> Pharaoh <WH6547>.

And Pharaoh <WH6547> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto his brethren <WH251>, What is your occupation <WH4639>? And they said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Pharaoh <WH6547>, Thy servants <WH5650> are shepherds <WH7462> <WH8802> <WH6629>, both we, and also our fathers <WH1>.

They said <WH559> <WH8799> moreover unto Pharaoh <WH6547>, For to sojourn <WH1481> <WH8800> in the land <WH776> are we come <WH935> <WH8804>; for thy servants <WH5650> have no pasture <WH4829> for their flocks <WH6629>; for the famine <WH7458> is sore <WH3515> in the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>: now therefore, we pray thee, let thy servants <WH5650> dwell <WH3427> <WH8799> in the land <WH776> of Goshen <WH1657>.
And Pharaoh <WH6547> spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto Yosef <WH3130>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Thy father <WH1> and thy brethren <WH251> are come <WH935> <WH8804> unto thee:

The land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> is before thee <WH6440>; in the best <WH4315> of the land <WH776> make <WH3427> thy father <WH1> and brethren <WH251> to dwell <WH3427> <WH8685>; in the land <WH776> of Goshen <WH1657> let them dwell <WH3427> <WH8799>: and if thou knowest <WH3045> <WH8804> <WH3426> any men <WH582> of activity <WH2428> among them, then make them <WH7760> <WH8804> rulers <WH8269> over my cattle <WH4735>.

And Yosef <WH3130> brought in <WH935> <WH8686> Ya`akov <WH3290> his father <WH1>, and set him <WH5975> <WH8686> before <WH6440> Pharaoh <WH6547>: and Ya`akov <WH3290> blessed <WH1288> <WH8762> Pharaoh <WH6547>.
And Pharaoh <WH6547> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Ya`akov <WH3290>, How <WH4100> old <WH2416> <WH3117> <WH8141> art thou?

And Ya`akov <WH3290> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Pharaoh <WH6547>, The days <WH3117> of the years <WH8141> of my pilgrimage <WH4033> are an hundred <WH3967> and thirty <WH7970> years <WH8141>: few <WH4592> and evil <WH7451> have the days <WH3117> of the years <WH8141> of my life <WH2416> been, and have not attained <WH5381> <WH8689> unto the days <WH3117> of the years <WH8141> of the life <WH2416> of my fathers <WH1> in the days <WH3117> of their pilgrimage <WH4033>.
And Ya`akov <WH3290> blessed <WH1288> <WH8762> Pharaoh <WH6547>, and went out <WH3318> <WH8799> from before <WH6440> Pharaoh <WH6547>.

And Yosef <WH3130> placed <WH3427> <WH8686> his father <WH1> and his brethren <WH251>, and gave <WH5414> <WH8799> them a possession <WH272> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, in the best <WH4315> of the land <WH776>, in the land <WH776> of Rameses <WH7486>, as Pharaoh <WH6547> had commanded <WH6680> <WH8765>.

And Yosef <WH3130> nourished <WH3557> <WH8770> his father <WH1>, and his brethren <WH251>, and all his father's <WH1> household <WH1004>, with bread <WH3899>, according <WH6310> to their families <WH2945>.

And there was no bread <WH3899> in all the land <WH776>; for the famine <WH7458> was very <WH3966> sore <WH3515>, so that the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> and all the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667> fainted <WH3856> <WH8799> by reason <WH6440> of the famine <WH7458>.

And Yosef <WH3130> gathered up <WH3950> <WH8762> all the money <WH3701> that was found <WH4672> <WH8737> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, and in the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>, for the corn <WH7668> which they bought <WH7666> <WH8802>: and Yosef <WH3130> brought <WH935> <WH8686> the money <WH3701> into Pharaoh's <WH6547> house <WH1004>.

And when money <WH3701> failed <WH8552> <WH8799> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, and in the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>, all the Egyptians <WH4714> came <WH935> <WH8799> unto Yosef <WH3130>, and said <WH559> <WH8800>, Give <WH3051> <WH8798> us bread <WH3899>: for why should we die <WH4191> <WH8799> in thy presence? for the money <WH3701> faileth <WH656> <WH8804>.
And Yosef <WH3130> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Give <WH3051> <WH8798> your cattle <WH4735>; and I will give <WH5414> <WH8799> you for your cattle <WH4735>, if money <WH3701> fail <WH656> <WH8804>.

And they brought <WH935> <WH8686> their cattle <WH4735> unto Yosef <WH3130>: and Yosef <WH3130> gave <WH5414> <WH8799> them bread <WH3899> in exchange for horses <WH5483>, and for the flocks <WH6629>, and for the cattle <WH4735> of the herds <WH1241>, and for the asses <WH2543>: and he fed <WH5095> <WH8762> them with bread <WH3899> for all their cattle <WH4735> for that year <WH8141>.

When that year <WH8141> was ended <WH8552> <WH8799>, they came <WH935> <WH8799> unto him the second <WH8145> year <WH8141>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, We will not hide <WH3582> <WH8762> it from my lord <WH113>, how that our money <WH3701> is spent <WH8552> <WH8804>; my lord <WH113> also hath <WH413> our herds <WH4735> of cattle <WH929>; there is not ought left <WH7604> <WH8738> in the sight <WH6440> of my lord <WH113>, but our bodies <WH1472>, and our lands <WH127>:

Wherefore shall we die <WH4191> <WH8799> before thine eyes <WH5869>, both we and our land <WH127>? buy <WH7069> <WH8798> us and our land <WH127> for bread <WH3899>, and we and our land <WH127> will be servants <WH5650> unto Pharaoh <WH6547>: and give <WH5414> <WH8798> us seed <WH2233>, that we may live <WH2421> <WH8799>, and not die <WH4191> <WH8799>, that the land <WH127> be not desolate <WH3456> <WH8799>.

And Yosef <WH3130> bought <WH7069> <WH8799> all the land <WH127> of Egypt <WH4714> for Pharaoh <WH6547>; for the Egyptians <WH4714> sold <WH4376> <WH8804> every man <WH376> his field <WH7704>, because the famine <WH7458> prevailed <WH2388> <WH8804> over them: so the land <WH776> became Pharaoh's <WH6547>.
And as for the people <WH5971>, he removed <WH5674> <WH8689> them to cities <WH5892> from one end <WH7097> of the borders <WH1366> of Egypt <WH4714> even to the other end <WH7097> thereof.

Only the land <WH127> of the Kohanim <WH3548> bought he <WH7069> <WH8804> not; for the Kohanim <WH3548> had a portion <WH2706> assigned them of Pharaoh <WH6547>, and did eat <WH398> <WH8804> their portion <WH2706> which Pharaoh <WH6547> gave <WH5414> <WH8804> them: wherefore they sold <WH4376> <WH8804> not their lands <WH127>.

Then Yosef <WH3130> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the people <WH5971>, Behold, I have bought <WH7069> <WH8804> <WH853> you this day <WH3117> and your land <WH127> for Pharaoh <WH6547>: lo <WH1887>, here is seed <WH2233> for you, and ye shall sow <WH2232> <WH8804> the land <WH127>.

And it shall come to pass in the increase <WH8393>, that ye shall give <WH5414> <WH8804> the fifth <WH2549> part unto Pharaoh <WH6547>, and four <WH702> parts <WH3027> shall be your own, for seed <WH2233> of the field <WH7704>, and for your food <WH400>, and for them of your households <WH1004>, and for food <WH398> <WH8800> for your little ones <WH2945>.

And they said <WH559> <WH8799>, Thou hast saved our lives <WH2421> <WH8689>: let us find <WH4672> <WH8799> grace <WH2580> in the sight <WH5869> of my lord <WH113>, and we will be Pharaoh's <WH6547> servants <WH5650>.

And Yosef <WH3130> made <WH7760> <WH8799> it a Torah <WH2706> over the land <WH127> of Egypt <WH4714> unto this day <WH3117>, that Pharaoh <WH6547> should have the fifth <WH2569> part; except <WH7535> the land <WH127> of the Kohanim <WH3548> only, which became not Pharaoh's <WH6547>.

And Yisra'EL <WH3478> dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, in the country <WH776> of Goshen <WH1657>; and they had possessions <WH270> <WH8735> therein, and grew <WH6509> <WH8799>, and multiplied <WH7235> <WH8799> exceedingly <WH3966>.

And Ya`akov <WH3290> lived <WH2421> <WH8799> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> seventeen <WH6240> <WH7651> years <WH8141>: so the whole age <WH2416> <WH3117> of Ya`akov <WH3290> was an hundred <WH3967> forty <WH705> <WH8141> and seven <WH7651> years <WH8141>.

And the time <WH3117> drew nigh <WH7126> <WH8799> that Yisra'EL <WH3478> must die <WH4191> <WH8800>: and he called <WH7121> <WH8799> his son <WH1121> Yosef <WH3130>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, If now I have found <WH4672> <WH8804> grace <WH2580> in thy sight <WH5869>, put <WH7760> <WH8798>, I pray thee, thy hand <WH3027> under my thigh <WH3409>, and deal <WH6213> <WH8804> kindly <WH2617> and truly <WH571> with me; bury <WH6912> <WH8799> me not, I pray thee, in Egypt <WH4714>:

But I will lie <WH7901> <WH8804> with my fathers <WH1>, and thou shalt carry <WH5375> <WH8804> me out of Egypt <WH4714>, and bury <WH6912> <WH8804> me in their buryingplace <WH6900>. And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, I will do <WH6213> <WH8799> as thou hast said <WH1697>.
And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Swear <WH7650> <WH8734> unto me. And he sware <WH7650> <WH8735> unto him. And Yisra'EL <WH3478> bowed <WH7812> <WH8691> himself upon the bed's <WH4296> head <WH7218>.
